1.16.3.1.16.3-0.0.3.0: Removed client network handler. Everything is stored on the server so no need.
1.16.3.1.16.3-0.0.6.0: Added thresholds and ticking for sanity.
1.16.3.1.16.3-0.0.8.1: Defer initial login callbacks from loading.
1.16.3.1.16.3-0.0.10.0: Added user ideas from sciwhiz12, lilypuree, Amber, Commoble, and jedijoe.
1.16.3.1.16.3-0.0.10.1: Fix api and main mod separation.
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.0.0.0: Ghost creepers and background music. Documented entire API.
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.0.0.1: noeppi-noeppi: Fix crashes on dedicated server when outside a development environment
1.16.3.1.16.3-1.0.1.0:
No Naviphobia
		Features:
		 - Commoble (Suggestion): Armor has an effect on the current sanity.
		 - BlueDuck (Suggestion): Night Vision makes the world clear.
		 - GiantLuigi4 (Suggestion): Holding items in your off hand might help.
		 - JTK222 (Suggestion): Curing entities helps you to relax.
		 - Add new ways to increase your maximum sanity.
		Balances:
		 - Now supports 1.16.3 and 1.16.4. 1.16.3 support will be dropped once SpookyJam updates or 1.17 releases.
		 - Updated the maximum sanity to a higher value and attached a hard mode to the mod that uses the current settings.
		 - Balanced teleporter callbacks.
		 - Balanced entity sanity damage.
		Bugfixes:
		 - GiantLuigi4 (Suggestion): Fix shaders in 3rd person.
		 - sciwhiz12 (Suggestion): Fix boat insanity.
